extension.summary: Auto Search for Subtitles on Play | Automatic subtitles for your content
extension.description: SubLoader auto trigger Kodi subtitle search dialog if no subtitle (language) with exclusions is found, or auto download the best subtitle automatically from OpenSubtitles.org as soon you start the video for a Movie/TV Show, and adds a subtitles dialog contextmenu button.
